page.title: 05KILSBY SCHOOL
page.content: Kilsby School was built in 1968 and 130 children attend it. There are 5 classrooms and they have 2 computers. At lunch time the children have a choice of dinners or sandwiches. Approximately 40 have dinners and 50 sandwiches each day.A school uniform is worn which is mostly maroon and grey.The 4th yrs learn French and everybody does cooking. The children go to Daventry Schhol when they leave which is 6 miles away.They travel on very overcrowded coaches. {Kilsby PTA { }There are 15 people on the Parents Association Committee.They meet about once every 2 months.They organise fund raising events such as Barn Dances, Jumble Sales,family discos and May Day. On May Day this year they raised Â£550 which was an improvement on the last few years.
